name: ecommerce_class_diagram
title: E-Commerce System Class Diagram
description: A simple UML class diagram showing the core domain model of an e-commerce system with customers, products, orders, and shopping cart functionality
python_code:
from diagrams import Diagram, Cluster, Edge
from diagrams.generic.compute import Rack
from diagrams.generic.database import SQL
from diagrams.generic.storage import Storage

graph_attr = {
    "fontsize": "24",
    "bgcolor": "white",
    "pad": "0.6",
    "splines": "ortho",
    "nodesep": "0.7",
    "ranksep": "0.9",
}

with Diagram(
    "E-Commerce System Class Diagram",
    filename="OUTPUT_PATH",
    outformat="png",
    show=False,
    direction="TB",
    graph_attr=graph_attr
):
    with Cluster("com.ecommerce.domain", graph_attr={"bgcolor": "#e3f2fd"}):
        # Core entities
        customer = Rack("Customer
---------
- id: Long
- email: String
- name: String
- address: String")
        product = Rack("Product
---------
- id: Long
- name: String
- price: Double
- stock: Integer")
        order = Rack("Order
---------
- id: Long
- orderDate: Date
- status: OrderStatus
- totalAmount: Double")
        
    with Cluster("com.ecommerce.cart", graph_attr={"bgcolor": "#e8f5e9"}):
        cart = Rack("ShoppingCart
---------
- id: Long
- createdDate: Date
- lastUpdated: Date")
        cartitem = Rack("CartItem
---------
- quantity: Integer
- price: Double")
        
    with Cluster("com.ecommerce.order", graph_attr={"bgcolor": "#fff8e1"}):
        orderitem = Rack("OrderItem
---------
- quantity: Integer
- unitPrice: Double
- subtotal: Double")
        payment = Rack("Payment
---------
- id: Long
- amount: Double
- paymentDate: Date
- status: PaymentStatus")
        
    # Relationships
    customer >> Edge(label="1      *", style="bold") >> order
    customer >> Edge(label="1      1", style="bold") >> cart
    cart >> Edge(label="1      *", style="bold") >> cartitem
    cartitem >> Edge(label="*      1", style="bold") >> product
    order >> Edge(label="1      *", style="bold") >> orderitem
    orderitem >> Edge(label="*      1", style="bold") >> product
    order >> Edge(label="1      1", style="bold") >> payment
    
    # Additional relationships
    cart >> Edge(label="converts to", style="dashed", color="green") >> order
